data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 7, Sochi's Nikita Burmistrov has run offside.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 10, Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Sochi throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 12, Lokomotiv Moscow needs to be cautious. Sochi have an attacking throw-in.
Timofey Margasov (Sochi) has hit the post with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 14, Anton Zabolotnyi is on target to give Sochi a 1-0 advantage.
Timofey Margasov with an assist there.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 16, Eder (Lokomotiv Moscow) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Anton Zabolotnyi of Sochi is pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 20, Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Lokomotiv Moscow's Fedor Smolov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sochi defender.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Sochi in Sochi.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lokomotiv Moscow are pushing forward but Vitali Lystsov's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 25, Sochi have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Rifat Zhemaletdinov misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maciej Rybus is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
Nikita Burmistrov for Sochi is back on the field again.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Stanislav Vasilev waits before resuming play because Nikita Burmistrov for Sochi is still down.
Maciej Rybus is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Maciej Rybus is back on the pitch.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Anton Zabolotnyi for Sochi drives towards goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 33, Anton Zabolotnyi (Sochi) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Anton Zabolotnyi (Sochi) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 34, Anton Zabolotnyi (Sochi) gets in a header – but the strike hits the post! Ohhhh so close.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sochi, Artur Yusupov of Sochi is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Nikita Burmistrov puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Maciej Rybus (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Sochi's half.
In the minute 45, Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sochi.
In the minute 45, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
The first half has been concluded at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow, close to Sochi's area.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 49, Lokomotiv Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Rifat Zhemaletdinov for Lokomotiv Moscow is whistled offside.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Free kick Lokomotiv Moscow.
Miha Mevlja (Sochi) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 56, Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dmitry Rybchinskiy (Lokomotiv Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
In the minute 58, Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sochi are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
In the minute 61, Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Sochi will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Lokomotiv Moscow.
Important block from the Sochi defence as Maciej Rybus fires in a strike for Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 63, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marko Nikolic (Lokomotiv Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Vitali Lisakovich replacing Dmitry Rybchinskiy.
Lokomotiv Moscow make their second substitution with Anton Miranchuk replacing Francois Kamano.
In the minute 65, Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Anton Miranchuk. .
Sochi drive forward but Joaozinho is judged offside.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 67, Elmir Nabiullin is on a sub for Miha Mevlja for Sochi.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Sochi.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
In the minute 70, Ivan Miladinovic is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
The home team have replaced Nikita Burmistrov with Kirill Zaika. This is the second substitution made today by Vladimir Fedotov.
In the minute 73, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Murilo Cerqueira (Lokomotiv Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
At Fisht Olympic Stadium, Soslan Dzhanaev has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 73, Attention is being given to Sochi’s Anton Zabolotnyi and play has been suspended briefly.
Daniil Kulikov (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Sochi's Anton Zabolotnyi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 75, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Ze Luis is replacing Fedor Smolov for the away team.
In the minute 77, Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 78, Sergey Terekhov (Sochi) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
In Sochi Sochi attack through Kirill Zaika. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 83, Stanislav Vasilev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
Nikita Iosifov is replacing Rifat Zhemaletdinov for Lokomotiv Moscow at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Vitali Lystsov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Free kick Lokomotiv Moscow.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sochi to check on Anton Zabolotnyi, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 88, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Anton Zabolotnyi is back on his feet again.
The home team replace Joaozinho with Ivan Novoseltsev.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
Sochi have a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow, close to Sochi's area.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Lokomotiv Moscow are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
The match has come to a close in Sochi. The final score is 2-1.
